title: Person of Interest - I guess there are things I care about here (04x07)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: Nice try, Shaw. We all know you're a med school dropout. I think you're more than capable of translating instructions on how to destroy a biological virus. Just admit you wanna spend time with Root ;).

could you upload the one when Root says to Shaw "while you may not be scared about what could happen to you the next time other people are. people who care for you" like the whole scene? thanks! your channel is a gift

hngnggg I just watched this episode today (for the 6th time).. it is so incredible.
Also learned that there has been 1 Dutch casualty in relation with the marburg virus :o
When ever finch walks, there are strange visual glitchs in the backround, can you fix it?
Mission Accomplished. Yep obvious now. The mission was to keep us in the family feud called the Persian Gulf for the past 20 years.
